name: Happy Grave!
description:
A fun and addictive game to keep you coming back for more and more.

Multiple mini games including
- Coffin Fit
- Grave Digger
- Eulogy Delivery
- Singing Choir
- Coffin Rush
- Coffin Dance
- Funeral Dresscode
- Swap Clothes
- Tombstone design
- Coffiin Design

- Many more
